name: Patourette
description:
Chester is a bird, that was fascinated with clouds. And he'll never forget the day that he saw clouds moving around on the ground.

Now he is some sort of a Hound dog since Valdemir (farm owner) put him to herd his sheeps, now Chester lives happily among his" moving clouds".............or maybe not. Maybe Valdemir has used Chester to do his job for him.

Oh Btw Chester the duck, barks sometimes.

Sounds and VFXs by:

- Bruno Marques - https://www.instagram.com/obrunomarques/

- Dani Stob - https://www.instagram.com/danistobgameaudio/

- Leticia Medeiros - https://www.behance.net/leticiamdrs
